oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Aerial bombing; al-Qassām, ʻIzz al-Dīn, 1882-1935; al-Ṣafṣāf Battle, 1948; al-Ṣafṣāf Massacre, 1948; Arab Revolt, 1936-1939; Betrayal; British colonization; British-Jewish relations; Druzes; Expulsion; Fathers; Loss; Martyrs; Mass murder; State of Israel; Suḥmātā (Palestine); Syrian Army; Village occupation; Zionist Invasion of Palestine, 1948; Zionist occupation; al-Qassām, ʻIzz al-Dīn, 1882-1935; al-Ṣafṣāf (Palestine); al-Ṣafṣāf Massacre, 1948; Arab Salvation Army; Asad, Ḥāfiẓ, 1930-2000; British-Jewish relations; Conspiracy; Decision making; Fathers; Israeli occupation; Jewish settlements; Leaders; Mass graves; Palestinian resistance; Palestinian-Jewish relations; Routes; Rumors; Shaykhs; Syria; Village occupation; Water resources; al-Ṣafṣāf (Palestine); Arab Salvation Army; Demolition; Economic aid; Expulsion; Family relations; Fathers; Funeral rites and ceremonies; Greetings; Imām; Israeli occupation; Maqām; Mayors; Personal belongings; Refugee experience; Resistance; Return; Routes; Smuggling; Tripoli (Lebanon)

oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on June 15, 1997 with ʻAlī al-Qādirī, male, born in 1924 in al-Ṣafṣāf, Palestine and resides in Nahr al-Bārid Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon. He was the Imām of the mosque in al-Ṣafṣāf.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع علي القادري في 15 حزيران يونيو عام 1997، ذكر، ولد عام 1924 في الصفصاف، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم نهر البارد للاجئين الفلسطنيين، لبنان. كان إمام الجامع في الصفصاف.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Zionist invasion and occupation of Palestine, 1948 . (@ 0:00)
